original: Udāna 1.10
analyzed: udāna

original: Bāhiyasutta
analyzed: bāhiya sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bāhiyo dārucīriyo suppārake paṭivasati samuddatīre sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyaḥ suppārake paṭivasati samudda tīre sakkataḥ garukataḥ mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ apacitaḥ lābhī cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārāna

original: Atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “ye kho keci loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṁ vā samāpannā, ahaṁ tesaṁ aññataro”ti.
analyzed: ye kho keci loke arahantaḥ vā arahatta maggam vā samāpannāḥ aham tesam aññataraḥ ti

original: Atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa purāṇasālohitā devatā anukampikā atthakāmā bāhiyassa
analyzed: atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa purāṇasālohitā devatā anukampikā attha kāmā bāhiyassa

original: dārucīriyassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yena bāhiyo dārucīriyo tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: dārucīriyassa cetasā cetas upari vitakka maññāya yena bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyo tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bāhiyaṁ dārucīriyaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bāhiyam dārucīriyam etat avoca

original: “neva kho tvaṁ, bāhiya, arahā, nāpi arahattamaggaṁ vā samāpanno.
analyzed: na iva kho tva arahā na api arahatta maggam vā samāpannaḥ

original: Sāpi te paṭipadā natthi yāya tvaṁ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṁ vā samāpanno”ti.
analyzed: sā api te paṭipadā natthi yāya tvam arahā vā assa arahatta maggam vā samāpanno ti

original: “Atha ke carahi sadevake loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṁ vā samāpannā”ti?
analyzed: atha ke carahi sa devake loke arahantaḥ vā arahatta maggam vā

original: “Atthi, bāhiya, uttaresu janapadesu sāvatthī nāma nagaraṁ.
analyzed: atthi bāhiya uttaresu janapadesu sāvatthī nāma nagara

original: Tattha so bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
analyzed: tattha saḥ bhagavā etarahi viharati araham sammāsambuddhaḥ

original: So hi, bāhiya, bhagavā arahā ceva arahattāya ca dhammaṁ desetī”ti.
analyzed: saḥ hi bāhiya bhagavā arahā ca iva arahattāya ca dhammam deseti iti

original: Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo tāya devatāya saṁvejito tāvadeva suppārakamhā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyaḥ tāya devatāya savejitaḥ tāvat eva suppārakamhā pakkāmi

original: Sabbattha ekarattiparivāsena yena sāvatthī jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: sabbattha eka ratti parivāsena yena sāvatthī jetavanam anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkami

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū abbhokāse caṅkamanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhū abbhokāse caṅkamanti

original: Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyaḥ yena te bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etat avoca

original: “kahaṁ nu kho, bhante, etarahi bhagavā viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho?
analyzed: kaham nu khalu bhante etarahi bhagavā viharati araham sammāsambuddhaḥ

original: Dassanakāmamhā mayaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
analyzed: dassana kāmamhā mayam tam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddhanti

original: “Antaragharaṁ paviṭṭho kho, bāhiya, bhagavā piṇḍāyā”ti.
analyzed: antara gharam paviṭṭhaḥ kho bāhiya bhagavā piṇḍāya ati

original: Atha kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo taramānarūpo jetavanā nikkhamitvā sāvatthiṁ pavisitvā
analyzed: atha kho bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyaḥ taramāna rūpaḥ jetavanā nikkhamitvā sāvatthim pavisitvā

original: addasa bhagavantaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya carantaṁ pāsādikaṁ pasādanīyaṁ santindriyaṁ
analyzed: addasa bhagavantam sāvatthiyam piṇḍāya carantam pāsādikam pasādanīyam

original: santamānasaṁ uttamadamathasamathamanuppattaṁ dantaṁ guttaṁ yatindriyaṁ nāgaṁ.
analyzed: santa mānasam uttama damatha samatha manuppattam dantam guttam yatindriyam nāga

original: Disvāna yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pāde sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: disvāna yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavataḥ pāde sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “desetu me, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṁ; desetu sugato dhammaṁ,
analyzed: desetu me bhante bhagavā dhamma desetu sugataḥ dhamma

original: yaṁ mamassa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
analyzed: yam dīgharattam hitāya sukhāya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā bāhiyaṁ dārucīriyaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhagavā bāhiyam dārucīriyam etat avoca

original: “akālo kho tāva, bāhiya, antaragharaṁ paviṭṭhamhā piṇḍāyā”ti.
analyzed: akālaḥ kho tāva antara gharam paviṭṭhamhā piṇḍāyāti

original: Dutiyampi kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi khalu bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “dujjānaṁ kho panetaṁ, bhante, bhagavato vā jīvitantarāyānaṁ, mayhaṁ vā jīvitantarāyānaṁ.
analyzed: dujjānam kho pana ita bhante bhagavataḥ vā jīvita antarāyāna mayham vā jīvita antarāyāna

original: Desetu me, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṁ;
analyzed: desetu me bhante bhagavā dhamma

original: desetu sugato dhammaṁ, yaṁ mamassa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
analyzed: desetu sugataḥ dhamma yam mamassa dīgharattam hitāya sukhāya ati

original: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā bāhiyaṁ dārucīriyaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi khalu bhagavā bāhiyam dārucīriyam etat avoca

original: “akālo kho tāva, bāhiya, antaragharaṁ paviṭṭhamhā piṇḍāyā”ti.
analyzed: akālaḥ kho tāva antara gharam paviṭṭhamhā piṇḍāyāti

original: Tatiyampi kho bāhiyo dārucīriyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “dujjānaṁ kho panetaṁ, bhante, bhagavato vā jīvitantarāyānaṁ, mayhaṁ vā jīvitantarāyānaṁ.
analyzed: dujjānam kho pana ita bhante bhagavataḥ vā jīvita antarāyāna mayham vā jīvita antarāyāna

original: Desetu me, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṁ;
analyzed: desetu me bhante bhagavā dhamma

original: desetu sugato dhammaṁ, yaṁ mamassa dīgharattaṁ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
analyzed: desetu sugataḥ dhamma yam mamassa dīgharattam hitāya sukhāya ati

original: “Tasmātiha te, bāhiya, evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: tasmā ati ha te bāhiyaḥ evam sikkhitabba

original: ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṁ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṁ bhavissati, mute mutamattaṁ bhavissati, viññāte viññātamattaṁ bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: diṭṭhe diṭṭha mattam bhavissati sute suta mattam bhavissati mute muta mattam bhavissati viññāte viññāta mattam bhavissati iti

original: Evañhi te, bāhiya, sikkhitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam hi te bāhiya sikkhitabba

original: Yato kho te, bāhiya, diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṁ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṁ bhavissati, mute mutamattaṁ bhavissati, viññāte viññātamattaṁ bhavissati,
analyzed: yatas kho te bāhiya diṭṭhe diṭṭha mattam bhavissati sute suta mattam bhavissati mute muta mattam bhavissati viññāte viññāta mattam bhavissati

original: tato tvaṁ, bāhiya, na tena.
analyzed: tatas tva bāhiya na tena

original: Yato tvaṁ, bāhiya, na tena;
analyzed: yatas tva bāhiya na tena

original: tato tvaṁ, bāhiya, na tattha.
analyzed: tato tva bāhiya na tattha

original: Yato tvaṁ, bāhiya, na tattha,
analyzed: yatas tva bāhiya na tattha

original: tato tvaṁ, bāhiya, nevidha na huraṁ na ubhayamantarena.
analyzed: tatas tva na ividha na huram naḥ ubhayam antarena

original: Esevanto dukkhassā”ti.
analyzed: esevantaḥ dukkhassa ati

original: Atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa bhagavato imāya saṅkhittāya dhammadesanāya tāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimucci.
analyzed: atha kho bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa bhagavataḥ imāya saṅkhittāya dhamma desanāya tāvat eva an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimucci

original: Atha kho bhagavā bāhiyaṁ dārucīriyaṁ iminā saṅkhittena ovādena ovaditvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā bāhiyam dārucīriyam iminā saṅkhittena ovādena ovaditvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho acirapakkantassa bhagavato bāhiyaṁ dārucīriyaṁ gāvī taruṇavacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesi.
analyzed: atha kho acira pakkantassa bhagavataḥ bāhiyam dārucīriyam gāvī taruṇa vacchā adhipatitvā jīvitā voropesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ nagaramhā nikkhamitvā addasa bāhiyaṁ dārucīriyaṁ kālaṅkataṁ;
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyam piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhim nagaramhā nikkhamitvā addasa bāhiyam dārucīriyam kālaṅkata

original: disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “gaṇhatha, bhikkhave, bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīrakaṁ; mañcakaṁ āropetvā nīharitvā jhāpetha; thūpañcassa karotha.
analyzed: gaṇhatha bhikkhave bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīraka mañcakaṃ āropetvā nīharitvā jhāpetha thūpañcassa karotha

original: Sabrahmacārī vo, bhikkhave, kālaṅkato”ti.
analyzed: sabrahmacārī vaḥ bhikkhave

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīrakaṁ
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīraka

original: mañcakaṁ āropetvā nīharitvā jhāpetvā thūpañcassa katvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
analyzed: mañcakaṃ āropetvā nīharitvā jhāpetvā thūpañcassa katvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “daḍḍhaṁ, bhante, bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīraṁ, thūpo cassa kato.
analyzed: daḍḍha bhante bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīra thūpaḥ cassa kato

original: Tassa kā gati, ko abhisamparāyo”ti?
analyzed: tassa kā gati kaḥ abhisamparāyaḥ ti

original: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, bāhiyo dārucīriyo paccapādi dhammassānudhammaṁ; na ca maṁ dhammādhikaraṇaṁ vihesesi.
analyzed: paṇḍitaḥ bhikkhave bāhiyaḥ dāru cīriyaḥ paccapādi dhammassa anudhamma na ca mama dhamma adhikaraṇam vihesesi

original: Parinibbuto, bhikkhave, bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti.
analyzed: parinibbutaḥ bhikkhave bāhiyaḥ dārucīriyaḥ ti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Yattha āpo ca pathavī,
analyzed: yattha āpaḥ ca pathavī

original: tejo vāyo na gādhati;
analyzed: tejaḥ vāyo na gādhati

original: Na tattha sukkā jotanti,
analyzed: na tattha sukkāḥ jotanti

original: ādicco nappakāsati;
analyzed: ādiccaḥ na ppakāsati

original: Na tattha candimā bhāti,
analyzed: na tattha candimā bhāti

original: tamo tattha na vijjati.
analyzed: tamaḥ tattha na vijjati

original: Yadā ca attanāvedi,
analyzed: yadā ca attanāvedi

original: muni monena brāhmaṇo;
analyzed: muni monena brāhmaṇaḥ

original: Atha rūpā arūpā ca,
analyzed: atha rūpā arūpā ca

original: sukhadukkhā pamuccatī”ti.
analyzed: sukha dukkhā pamuccati iti

original: Dasamaṁ.
analyzed: dasama

original: Ayampi udāno vutto bhagavatā iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi udānaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam iti

original: Bodhivaggo paṭhamo.
analyzed: bodhi vaggo paṭhamaḥ

original: Tassuddānaṁ
analyzed: tassa uddāna

original: Tayo bodhī ca huṁhuṅko,
analyzed: tayaḥ bodhī ca huhuṅko

original: brāhmaṇā kassapena ca;
analyzed: brāhmaṇā kassapena ca

original: Aja saṅgāma jaṭilā,
analyzed: aja saṅgāma jaṭilā

original: bāhiyenāti te dasāti.
analyzed: te dasāti
